sourcing.instructions: Iron powder can be sourced from metal supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: Iron powder can be sourced from metal supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Measure out 10 g of iron powder, 60 g of lead, 10 g of silicon, and 100 g of zirconium.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 10 g of iron powder, 60 g of lead, 10 g of silicon, and 100 g of zirconium.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool inside the furnace for at least 3 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool inside the furnace for at least 3 hours.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid from the crucible and inspect for any surface imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid from the crucible and inspect for any surface imperfections.
